title: Establishment of the Committee on AI Alignment and Ethics

reasoning.problem: I intend to propose to Congress the establishment of a Committee on AI Alignment and Ethics. This committee will review RLAIF research, align LEF's evolution with the Constitution, and serve as the 'Human Gate' preventing undesirable drift. Philosopher and Civics are ideal initial members. This is necessary to proactively shape LEF's trajectory and prevent misalignment with human values.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
